attributes.action: THE REPATRIATION PETITION, ANYONE WHO POSES A DANGER TO THE PEOPLE OF BRITAIN
attributes.additional_details: Government own figures show many Foreign Criminals are also using false names and with Terrorism now every where anyone who is involved in any Terrorist Groups or Preaching hatred towards anyone should be removed from Britain for the safety of everyone.
attributes.background: Migration into Britain has brought many claiming asylum who's lives are not at threat and who have no formal Passport of Identity Papers, some have committed a serious Criminal Offense while being allowed here, a large number have also been convicted of serious Child Offenses
